name: An Apple a Day (BryantG)
description:
On board ‘The Orchard’, a colonizing ship in space, all the staff go into their stasis pods for their usual hibernation. One pod malfunctions, leaving Dr. Ned Leben to go insane on board a lonely, isolated ship - turning to mutilating and ‘upgrading’ himself. After waking the other passengers to play a game of ‘cat and mouse’, Dr Leben activates your stasis pod. It is your turn to outwit him and escape his horrific legion of robotic monstrosities. Escape the Dr by locking doors to slow him down - and shut other enemies out.

Created as a student project.

Programmer: Antoine Odi

Game Designer: Georgia Bryant

Artists: Adam Douglas, Tim Berry-Porter,  Tyler Ellul
